alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 1:52PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Potential total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Northeast wind frequently gusting 40 to 60 mph. * WHERE...Rock Springs and Green River, Flaming Gorge and East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible as the snow and wind combine to create reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty west wind Tuesday afternoon will abruptly switch to the northeast early Wednesday morning. Speeds will steadily increase to gust 40 to 60 mph Wednesday. Travelers should be prepared for near white-out conditions at times through the daytime hours Wednesday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. This storm has the potential to create widespread travel impacts.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Rock Springs and Green River
